text: Table 1 Indications for use or consideration of TIVA in paediatric cases Patient Malignant hyperthermia history, susceptibility, or risk Muscular dystrophy, core myopathy, or neuromuscular disease Previous history of PONV or motion sickness Risk or previous history of emergence delirium History of acute or chronic reactive airways Fear of facemask Minimization of allergy risk Surgical Airway surgery or shared airway procedures Requirement for evoked potential monitoring, e.g. scoliosis surgery Neurosurgical procedures Middle ear surgery Procedures with high PONV risk, e.g. strabismus, T&A Procedural Remote site anaesthesia, e.g. MRI Muscle biopsy for neuromuscular diagnosis
